You are assigned to a People Management Team representative from your first day at EPAM. You can contact them with any questions except for those related to your project. The first acquaintance with your People Team representative usually occurs on your first working day. On the Onboarding Portal, you can always see who your People Management Team representative is and quickly contact them through the “PEOPLE WHO MAY HELP” section.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can also reach out to your People Management Team representative if first days at EPAM can be very challenging. To enhance your onboarding, buddy will be assigned to you. Buddy is one of your peers who can provide advice and guidance on different aspects of your work. A Buddy helps you to acclimate to EPAM’s (or the customer's) culture and workplace.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":1525,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/f121241a-716f-48a4-ade4-26e2bcc97bc6/mentor.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/f121241a-716f-48a4-ade4-26e2bcc97bc6/mentor.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"mentor.png\",\"name\":\"mentor.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"f121241a-716f-48a4-ade4-26e2bcc97bc6\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":701,\"height\":48},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At EPAM we have many mentoring programs aimed at teaching basic primary skills or new technologies. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Mentor is a person who has a wealth of knowledge and experience in the professional area, motivated to spend personal time for knowledge transfer. If you feel that your expertise needs to be developed or want to acquire new skills and knowledge required for working on a project, you can take part in our Mentoring program where you will be given a Mentor.
